Agathe Shella Efire **"Auba"** Master's student, working on the molecular diagnosis of arboviruses and managing a syndromic surveillance project in Senegal (4S), aimed at improving patient care in hospitals, while targeting a range of pathogens in order to develop molecular and serological diagnostic tests.

Skills : Classical Virology, Molecular Biology, Sequencing, ELISA
